code: import logoPL from'../../assets/images/PL.webp';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import AnimatedLetters from'../AnimatedLetters/Animletters.jsx';import Loader from'react-loaders';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./index.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[letterClass,setLetterClass]=useState('text-animate');const welcArray="Welcome to".split("");const premArray="Premier Team Fantasy!".split("");useEffect(()=>{const timerId=setTimeout(()=>{setLetterClass('text-animate-hover');},4000);return()=>{clearTimeout(timerId);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-area",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logoPL,alt:"Logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedLetters,{letterClass:letterClass,strArray:welcArray,idx:12,className:"animated-letters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatedLetters,{letterClass:letterClass,strArray:premArray,idx:15,className:"animated-letters"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Home for Everything Premier League Related!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/teams",className:"flat-button",children:"GET STARTED"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{type:"pacman"})]});};export default Home;
